item.title: Spawn objects[changed]
item.dc:creator: @Taylor_John0 Taylor John0
item.description:
@Taylor_John0 wrote:

Add a public void for addGlobalObject, and put addGlobalObject() under case 185.

[code]public void makeGlobalObject(int x, int y, int typeID, int orientation, int tileObjectType){ //Makes Global objects
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players){
if(p != null){
client person = (client)p;
if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != “null”)){
if(person.distanceToPoint(x, y) <= 60){
person.createNewTileObject(x, y, typeID, orientation, tileObjectType);
}
}
}
}
}

public void NewObjects() { // Pk4r Pk4r ( non laggy !)

makeGlobalObject(3213, 3434, 411, 0, 10);//prayer
makeGlobalObject(3207, 3430, 2513, 0, 10);//range
makeGlobalObject(3211, 3424, 2873, 0, 10);//atk
makeGlobalObject(3212, 3424, 2874, 0, 10);//str
makeGlobalObject(3213, 3424, 2875, 0, 10);//def
makeGlobalObject(3208, 3425, 2213, 0, 10);//bank
makeGlobalObject(3208, 3424, 2213, 0, 10);//bank
makeGlobalObject(3207, 3429, 2465, 0, 10);//magic portal
makeGlobalObject(3203, 3428, 7273, 0, 10);//barrows portal
makeGlobalObject(2825, 3809, 2587, -1, 10);//chest
makeGlobalObject(2738, 5087, 6409, -1, 10);
makeGlobalObject(3201, 3428, 7324, 0, 10);//big/secret zone
}
[/code]
somthin like that
